name: Stefan Manegold
content: Mane's homepage Prof. Dr. Stefan Manegold The CWI Database Architectures group (DA) is hiring! Tenure-track position in Data Science Systems Architecture Function: (0.8 fte) Senior ResearcherScientific Staff Member Function: (0.2 fte) Professor for Data Management Centrum Wiskunde & Informatica (Wiskunde = Mathematics Informatica = Computer Science) LeidenUniversity Faculty of Science Database Architectures (DA) Institute: Leiden Institute of Advanced Computer Science (LIACS) Info: profile Info: profile Address: P.O.Box 94079 1090 GB Amsterdam The Netherlands Visit: Science Park 123 / Room L321 1098 XG Amsterdam phone: +31 (0)20 592-4212 email: Stefan.Manegold@cwi.nl Xing: LinkedIn: (former) Function: (2008-2020) Co-Founder ResearchGate: B.V. Curriculum  Vitae: 25 February 2021 Navigation: Professional & Research Interests Present Projects Past Projects Awards Publications The Dutch-Belgian DataBase Day (DBDBD) 2024 Friday, 22 November 2024, CWI, Amsterdam Professional & Research Interests Column-store Database Architectures and Technologies Data Management for Sciences Analytical Database Systems Parallel and Distributed Information Systems Cost Models for Database Query Optimization XML storage & XQuery processing using RDBMS technology Hardware-aware Database Technology Processor Achitectures and Hierarchical Cache Memories Optimization, Scalability, Performance, and Benchmarking Multi-Architecture/Cross-Platform Software-Development & -Testing Present Projects --- Query Processing at Light-Speed --- Database Technology to advance Science PROMIMOOC --- Process mining for multi-objective online control (NWO/NLeSC) DAMIOSO --- Data Mining on High Volume Simulation Output (NWO) CIMPLO ---
